mapper.select: SELECT users_no ,users_id ,users_name ,users_phone ,users_role FROM users WHERE users_no = #{usersNo}

SELECT c.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn , a.* FROM (SELECT r.request_no ,r.requester ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place) as ctt_place ,r.ctt_place_area ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place_situation) as ctt_place_situation ,r.hope_ctt_budget ,r.hope_ctt_start_dt ,r.hope_ctt_end_dt ,r.postcode ,r.address ,r.detail_address ,r.title ,r.content ,r.write_dt ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.request_state) as request_state ,r.file_id ,f.save_name ,f.original_file_name ,f.save_path ,f.ext ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.category_code) as category_code ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.region_code) as region_code ,u.users_name FROM request r JOIN users u ON r.requester = u.users_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail_info f ON r.file_id = f.file_id AND f.boss_tf = 'Y' WHERE r.request_state !='S07' ORDER BY r.request_no DESC) a ) c
WHERE c.rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND c.rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT r.request_no ,r.requester ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place) as ctt_place ,r.ctt_place_area ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place_situation) as ctt_place_situation ,r.hope_ctt_budget ,r.hope_ctt_start_dt ,r.hope_ctt_end_dt ,r.postcode ,r.address ,r.detail_address ,r.title ,r.content ,r.write_dt ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.request_state) as request_state ,r.file_id ,f.save_name ,f.original_file_name ,f.save_path ,f.ext ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.category_code) as category_code ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.region_code) as region_code ,u.users_name FROM request r JOIN users u ON r.requester = u.users_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail_info f ON r.file_id = f.file_id AND f.boss_tf = 'Y' ) a
AND request_no > 0

SELECT r.request_no ,r.requester ,r.ctt_place ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place) as ctt_place_nm ,r.ctt_place_area ,r.ctt_place_situation ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.ctt_place_situation) as ctt_place_situation_nm ,r.hope_ctt_budget ,r.hope_ctt_start_dt ,r.hope_ctt_end_dt ,r.postcode ,r.address ,r.detail_address ,r.title ,r.content ,r.write_dt ,r.request_state ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.request_state) as request_state_nm ,r.region_code ,r.file_id ,f.save_name ,f.ext ,f.original_file_name ,f.save_path ,r.category_code ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.category_code) as category_code_nm ,u.users_name ,FIND_COMMONCODE(r.region_code) as region_code_nm ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proposal WHERE request_no = r.request_no) as pps_count FROM request r JOIN users u ON r.requester = u.users_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail_info f ON r.file_id = f.file_id
WHERE r.request_no = #{requestNo}

SELECT p.worker ,u.users_name ,p.ctt_start_dt ,p.ctt_end_dt ,u.users_phone ,p.comments ,r.request_no ,p.proposal_no ,NVL(( SELECT contract_no FROM contract WHERE proposal_no = p.proposal_no ),0) as contract_no
FROM proposal p JOIN users u ON u.users_no = p.worker LEFT OUTER JOIN request r ON r.request_no = p.request_no
WHERE r.request_no =#{requestNo} and (p.proposal_state = 'A01' or p.proposal_state = 'A02')
ORDER BY contract_no desc, p.proposal_no desc
SELECT proposal_detail_no ,proposal_no ,product ,unit ,qty ,unitprice ,comments FROM proposal_detail WHERE proposal_no =#{proposalNo} ORDER BY proposal_detail_no

SELECT c.contract_no ,c.ctt_name ,c.ctt_price ,c.requester_info ,c.requester_address ,c.requester_account ,USERNAME(c.worker_info) as users_name ,c.worker_info ,c.worker_address ,c.worker_account ,c.contract_division ,c.unity_contract_no ,c.file_id ,c.proposal_no ,c.write_dt ,c.update_dt ,FIND_COMMONCODE(c.contract_state) as contract_state ,c.ctt_start_dt ,c.ctt_end_dt ,p.request_no ,u.users_phone FROM contract c JOIN proposal p ON p.proposal_no = c.proposal_no JOIN users u ON u.users_no = c.worker_info WHERE p.request_no = #{requestNo} and rownum =1

SELECT cr.CTT_REPORT_NO, cr.TITLE, cr.DETAIL_CONTENT, cr.CTT_DIVISION, cr.ACCESS_STATE, cr.CTT_REPORT_DT, cr.FILE_ID, cr.CONTRACT_NO FROM CTT_REPORT cr JOIN contract c ON cr.CONTRACT_NO = c.contract_no JOIN proposal p ON c.proposal_no = p.proposal_no WHERE p.request_no = #{requestNo} AND p.proposal_state = 'A02'

SELECT m.member_no, m.users_no, u.users_name, u.users_phone, m.member_division, m.work_code, FIND_COMMONCODE(m.work_code) work_code_nm, m.partnership_contract_no, m.team_no FROM member m JOIN users u ON m.users_no = u.users_no JOIN team t ON m.team_no = t.team_no JOIN contract c ON t.contract_no = c.contract_no JOIN proposal p ON c.proposal_no = p.proposal_no WHERE p.proposal_state = 'A02' AND p.request_no = #{requestNo}
